summary: Get the Creator Affiliate's Marketplace information and performance metrics in the last 30 days
description:
Get the Creator Affiliate's Marketplace information and performance metrics in the last 30 days.  Version
202505
  
API Testing Tool

query.description: Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response.  Get by API Get Authorization Shop
Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

header.description: The seller access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 0. Follow this guide to get seller access_token.

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

children.description: Data associated with the creator's TikTok profile.
TikTok user name.
TikTok nickname.
Metadata and data associated with the creator's TikTok profile avatar.
The URL for the creator's TikTok profile avatar.
The region associated with the creator.
The biography description associated with the creator.
The creator's follower count.
The URL for the creator's TikTok profile page.
A list of category identifiers associated with the products for which the creator has created posts.
A list of the top 10 brands with which the creator has previously collaborated.
The total number of brands with which the creator has previously collaborated.
The total number of units sold. Units are indexed to SKU. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, this property will not be present.

The range of minimum number of units sold to maximum number of units sold over the lifetime of the creator account. Note that this property is included if the target market is US only. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The lowest number of units sold.
The highest number of units sold.
The formatted range of minimum number of units sold to maximum number of units sold over the lifetime of the creator account.
Gross merchandise value (GMV) metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
The total GMV associated with the creator.
The video GMV metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
The total video GMV associated with the creator.
Livestream GMV metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
Total livestream GMV associated with the creator.

The range of GMV values associated with this creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is US only. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
The lowest GMV value.
The highest GMV value.
The formatted range of GMV values associated with this creator.
E-commerce live stream engagement rate in hundredths of a percent. For example, 6000 is 60%.
GMV distribution by category.
The top-level category identifier.
GMV associated with the category in hundredths of a percent.
GMV associated with creator content by content type.
The content type. This an enumerated type with values:  - VIDEO - LIVE - SHOWCASE
Content GMV distribution value in hundredths of a percent.
Original promoted product price metadata and data associated with the creator.
The currency code.
The lowest original promoted product price.
The higest original promoted product price.
GMV per mille (GPM) metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
The GPM amount.
Livestream GMV per mille (GPM) metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
The livestream GPM amount.
Video GMV per mille (GPM) metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
The video GPM amount.

The range of GPM values associated with the creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is US. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
The lowest GPM value.
The highest GPM value.
The formatted range of GPM values associated with the creator.

The range of video GPM values associted with the creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is US. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
The lowest video GPM value.
The highest video GPM value.
The formatted range of video GPM values associted with the creator.

The range of livestream GPM values associted with the creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is US only. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
The lowest livestream GPM value.
The highest livestream GPM value.
The formatted range of livestream GPM values associted with the creator.
The number of promoted products associated with the creator.
The number of e-commerce livestreams associated with the creator.
The number of e-commerce video posts associated with the creator.
The average number of number of e-commerce video plays.
The average commission rate in hundredths of a percent. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The range of average commission rates associated with the creator. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The smallest average commission rate in hundredths of a percent.
The largest average commission rate in hundredths of a percent.

Average GMV per buyer metadata and data associated with the creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is US only. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
The average GMV per buyer amount.

The range of average GMV per buyer associated with the creator. Note that this property is included if the target market is US only. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.
The currency code.
The smallest average GMV per buyer.
The largest average GMV per buyer.
The formatted range of average GMV per buyer associated with the creator.
Average live stream views with promoted products.
Average e-commerce live stream likes.
Average e-commerce live stream comments.
Average e-commerce live stream shares.
Average e-commerce video likes.
Average e-commerce video comments.
Average e-commerce video shares.
